title: What did you get for Christmas this year?
body:
I got a homemade scrapbook of my past seasonal jobs, a photo book of my latest season, a nice shirt, some socks (you know you're an adult when you're happy to get socks), an ornament, and a model of one of my favourite car types.

What did you guys get?  If you didn't celebrate Christmas, go ahead and list your favourite gift you've gotten for other holidays/birthdays/reasons =)
